org.mini2Dx.core.controller

Interface MdxController<T extends MdxControllerListener>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinuxPS3Controller, LinuxXbox360Controller, LinuxXboxOneController, MacPS3Controller, MacPS4Controller, MacXbox360Controller, MacXboxOneController, PS3Controller, PS4Controller, WindowsPS3Controller, WindowsPS4Controller, WindowsXbox360Controller, WindowsXboxOneController, Xbox360Controller, XboxOneController

    public interface MdxController<T extends MdxControllerListener>
extends com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener
    Common interface for mini2Dx controller implementations

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getControllerType

        ControllerType getControllerType()
        Returns the ControllerType for this controller
        Returns:
        ControllerType.UNKNOWN if the controller is unknown

                 T listener)
        Inserts a listener at the specified index to the controller
        Parameters:
        index - The index to insert the listener at
        listener - The listener to insert

        Adds a listener to the controller

        Removes a listener at the specified index from this controller
        Parameters:

      • removeListener

        Removes a listener from this controller
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove

      • getListener

        Gets the listener at the specified index for this controller
        Parameters:
        index - The index to return
        Returns:
        The listener

      • getTotalListeners

        int getTotalListeners()
        Returns the total number of listeners for this controller
        Returns:
        0 if there are no listeners

        Removes all listeners from this controller
